title.rendered: Bangladesh vs Ireland, 2nd T20I 2023: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Team

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team on basis of probable XIs, recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Bangladesh: Litton Das (wk), Rony Talukdar, Najmul Hossain Shanto, Shamim Hossain, Towhid Hridoy, Shakib Al Hasan (c), Mehidy Hasan Miraz, Nasum Ahmed, Taskin Ahmed, Mustafizur Rahman, Hasan Mahmud

Ireland: Paul Stirling (c), Ross Adair, Lorcan Tucker (wk), Harry Tector, George Dockrell, Gareth Delany, Curtis Campher, Mark Adair, Craig Young, Graham Hume, Benjamin White/Fionn Hand

Pitch Report

Venue: Zahur Ahmed Chowdhury Stadium, Chattogram

(Based on the last three games)

1st innings average score: 167

2nd innings average score: 152

Wickets per innings: 5

Type: Good for batting

Wins

Batting 1st: 33%

Batting 2nd: 67%

Fantasy Tips of The Day

Shakib Al Hasan has encouraging all-round numbers at the Zahur Ahmed Chowdhury Stadium: 243 runs at 61 and nine wickets including the best figures of three for nine.

Since the beginning of 2022, Craig Young has picked 23 wickets including five two-fors in 12 T20Is. Talk about being a strike bowler!

It has been a dream year with the bat for Najmul Hossain Shanto at home. In nine limited-overs games, he has accumulated 300 runs at 52 including four fifties.

Taskin Ahmed hasn’t gone wicketless in his last eight international white-ball games at home, overall bagging 17 wickets. In Chattogram, he has hunted down five wickets in two T20Is.

Harry Tector (99 runs, six wickets, and three catches) has featured in the Best11 in four of his last five T20Is.

In the process of providing the required impetus for Bangladesh at the top, Litton Das has smashed 266 runs at 67 including three half-centuries in his last five white-ball outings.

Besides adding 129 runs (15 boundaries) at 32 , Lorcan Tucker has inflicted four dismissals in his last five T20Is.

Be it with new or old ball, Mark Adair has made his presence felt in fantasy leagues. He has taken 14 wickets in his last 10 white-ball games, going wicketless only once.

George Dockrell has managed only 147 runs and a wicket in his last 10 T20Is.
